summary: Updated notation-conventions.md with new 'Semantic Functions: Extension vs Interpretation' section. Documented the distinction between \ext{t} for term extension and \interp{\cdot} for sentence interpretation. Marked \sem{t} as deprecated. Clarified the difference between \interp{f} (symbol interpretation) and \interp{\cdot} (function notation).

artifacts.summary: Updated with new Semantic Functions section documenting \ext and \interp notation
Implementation summary with phase log and changes made

completion_data.completion_summary: Documented the LaTeX notation convention distinguishing term extension (\ext) from sentence interpretation (\interp{\cdot}) in notation-conventions.md. Added comprehensive guidance on when to use each macro and the homomorphism property.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added 'Semantic Functions: Extension vs Interpretation' section to .claude/context/project/latex/standards/notation-conventions.md with extension/interpretation distinction

next_steps: Review implementation and optionally create follow-up task to add \ext macro to logos-notation.sty
